Content.Text:
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm gonna do my
best again today for the town.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. This is a great
place to live for Harvest Sprites like
us.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm gonna do my
best again today for the town.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. I cook all the meals for
the Harvest Goddess.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I have to cook quickly or she'll get
mad. I'm afraid of her.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. My sister sounds rough,
but please forgive her.
<PAGE>
She's actually very nice and kind, I
promise.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. You work very hard, 
<MYNAME>. I admire you.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. It gets really
dark at night around here. It's scary.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. You're working
hard again today. Let's both do our best
again tomorrow!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. The moon looks
so pretty from here.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, the forest is very pretty at
this time of year. The animals are
full of life too.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>, it's hot. So hot, I feel
like jumping in the river.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, the rice is so good at this
time of year. The Harvest Goddess
has been eating a lot too.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's cold. It's so cold I feel
like I'm going to turn into a snowman.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We have high hopes for you, <MYNAME>.
The Harvest Goddess and all of us are
rooting for you, so work hard!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm different from my sister, and I'm
really good at all kinds of housework.
Sister can't do anything...
<PAGE>
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Oh, but don't tell her I said that.
She'd blow her top if she found out.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We Harvest Sprites assist the Harvest
Goddess and help those who are in
trouble.
<PAGE>
I deliver lost items, grow flowers, and
other things that people don't know
about. It's sorta cool.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
From long ago, there have only been two
Harvest Sprites in this area.
<PAGE>
Some places have more Harvest Sprites, 
and some places have less.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Harvest Goddess says it's up to me
and Sister to help you out, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I don't know about Sister, but I'll
support you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Until you came, <MYNAME>, the town was so
lifeless and we had so little to do.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But since you came, the town is
bustling with activity and we're
so busy now.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You are kind to Harvest Sprites, <MYNAME>.
I've gotten to know you and understand.
I like you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
If you're ever in trouble, <MYNAME>,
I'll come running. Just leave it to me.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've gotta hand it to you, <MYNAME>.
You know me so well. Truffles are
my favorite.
<PAGE>
The mellow aromas and flavors when you
take a bite are irresistible! Thank you,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Can I have it, <MYNAME>?
You know me so well.
Thank you!
<PAGE>
I'm so glad you are my friend,
<MYNAME>. Please continue to
be good to me.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Can I have it, <MYNAME>?
You know me so well.
Thank you!
<PAGE>
Can you give something to my sister too?
Otherwise, she'll scold me later.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can I have it, <MYNAME>? Thank you.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>... Oh... I really don't care
for this. It's okay, I'll give it to
the Harvest Goddess.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, I'm upset. I've done
my very best for you.
<PAGE>
And this is what you give me? I can't
believe it! You're so mean!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You have to get rid of trash from the
shed quickly! Why must I be the one to
do it? It's so unfair!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's...so heavy. I feel like my body is
being crushed. Can you lift it up?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I won't have to worry about meals for
quite a while. Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'll
eat a little at a time and make it last.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's...so...heavy. Ooooh...I feel like
I'm being crushed... Can you lift it up?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Phew...what a shock. I've never seen
produce this big. We can eat our fill.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'm so grateful.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't accept anything from
you, <MYNAME>. My sister will
scold me.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't need anymore, today. I'm sorry.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present for me? I'm so
happy. This aroma...it's a truffle!
<PAGE>
You're a great guy, <MYNAME>. I'm so
blessed to know you.
<PAGE>
Please don't tell Sister that I got a
birthday present. She'll scold me if she
found out.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? You're fantastic,
bringing me just what I love, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
You're gonna be a big success, <MYNAME>. You can
trust me on that.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, a birthday present for me. Thank
you, <MYNAME>. I'm gonna show the Harvest
Goddess.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I never thought I'd get something I
didn't like for my birthday. <MYNAME>,
you're mean.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You're mean, <MYNAME>! Something is wrong
with you, giving me a birthday present
that I hate!
<PAGE>
I'm gonna tell Sister on you! You're
gonna regret it.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
The shed is so dirty, it's ruined my
birthday. You're so mean, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'm gonna tell the Goddess and have her
punish you! You're gonna regret it.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's...so heavy. I feel like my body is
being crushed. Can you lift it up?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Phew, that was heavy. But what a nice
birthday present. I won't have to worry
about meals for quite a while.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. We'll eat a little at
a time.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's...so...heavy. Ooooh...I feel like
I'm being crushed... Can you lift it up?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Phew...what a shock. But what a great
birthday present. We can eat our fill.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'm so grateful.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's the Flower Festival for you
humans today? I understand.
I'll take it.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're giving me candy because I look
like a kid? I'm not a kid! But I thank
you for your thoughtfulness anyways.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a pretty shuttlecock. I'll bet my
sister will want it. If I show it to
her, she'll probably take it.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a pretty ring. I'll bet my sister
will want it. If I show it to her,
she'll probably take it.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is my friend. I always get to go
riding on her back. Are you friends
with her too, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is my friend. We play together
when we have time. It's so much fun.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's your birthday today, <MYNAME>. 
Someday, I will give you a present for
working so hard!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's your birthday today, <MYNAME>. 
The Harvest Goddess told me. Happy
birthday!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's <MYNAME>. I feel as though I
haven't seen you in such a long time.
Are you working hard?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sheet music for <GREEN>The Basic Scale</GREEN>
is in <GREEN>Dunhill's house</GREEN>. It's in an
obvious place and easy to find!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sheet music for <GREEN>The Burbling Brook</GREEN>
is in <GREEN>Tina's house</GREEN>. It's hidden inside
something very pretty!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sheet music for <GREEN>Earth Song</GREEN>
is in <GREEN>the restaurant</GREEN>. Close to
the table, I suspect!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sheet music for <GREEN>Birdy Banquet</GREEN>
is in <GREEN>Rod's house</GREEN>. Here's a hint: The
corner of the room.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sheet music for <GREEN>Rock Dance</GREEN> is in
<GREEN>the clinic</GREEN>. Check out the
partitions!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sheet music for <GREEN>Round the Big Tree</GREEN>
is <GREEN>in the inn</GREEN>. It's in a dark
place!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The sheet music for <GREEN>Morning on the Farm</GREEN>
is in <GREEN>Soseki's house</GREEN>. Something about
the wall is suspicious!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sheet music for <GREEN>The Howl of the Wild</GREEN>
is in <GREEN>Michelle's house</GREEN>. It's in a
really scary place!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sheet music for <GREEN>Friends on the Farm</GREEN>
is in <GREEN>the travel agency</GREEN>. Check the
area by the counter!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sheet music for <GREEN>Tranquil Forest</GREEN>
is in <GREEN>Olivia's house</GREEN>. It sparkles!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sheet music for <GREEN>Mammoth Stomp</GREEN> is
in <GREEN>Amir and Sanjay's house</GREEN>. You'll get
so excited!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sheet music of <GREEN>The Great Legacy</GREEN>
is in <GREEN>the clothing shop</GREEN>. The wall
is suspicious!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The sheet music of <GREEN>The Lion's Dance</GREEN>
is in <GREEN>the Witch Princess' house</GREEN>. It's
large and very ferocious!
